comments.en: 1 colour (CMY) cartridge and optionally 1 black (K) cartridge

Very inexpensive entry level model.

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Super inexpensive printer (49 dollars at HP), comes with only the color (CMY) cartrdge (black cartridge optional), very small cartridges (10 ml black, 8 ml color smaller than the cartridges of the portable DeskJet 450).

Does not understand PCL as most other DeskJets, it uses the so-called "Lightweight Imaging Device Interface Language" (LIDIL), these printers are supported by the "hpijs" driver beginning from version 1.3. The driver supports resolutions only up to 600 dpi, head alignment settings stored in the printer are not made use of, so use a one-cartridge (CMY) printing mode in case of mis-alignments.
